description: Source files for the AppGateway plugin within the WPEFramework-based project. The files include core implementation, responder logic, resolver, and module management for the plugin.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class implementing the AppGateway plugin logic.

classes.name: AppGatewayResponder
classes.description: Handles responder logic within the plugin, processing incoming requests.

classes.name: AppGatewayImplementation
classes.description: Implementation details for the AppGateway plugin functionality.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Class responsible for resolving plugin dependencies or configurations.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: Manages plugin module lifecycle and registration.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Sets up the plugin, registers factories, and prepares internal state.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Cleans up resources and unregisters components.

methods.name: HandleRequest
methods.description: Processes incoming requests through the responder.
